channel.title: fine-tuning on Haoming Jiang
channel.description: Recent content in fine-tuning on Haoming Jiang

item.title: State-of-the-art Results on GLUE Benchmark
item.description: Our recent collabrative work with Microsoft Dynamics 365 AI and Microsoft Research AI (paper, code) achieves state-of-the-art results in 5 of 9 GLUE benchmark tasks and an overall GLUE task performance 89.9, which outperforms all existing models. The reuslts are summerized as follows: Method CoLA SST MRPC STS-B QQP MNLI-m/mm QNLI RTE WNLI AX Score #params Previous SOTA 70.8 97.1 91.9/89.2 92.
